articles.title: Truck driver tests positive for COVID-19 in SA, after earlier negative test in NSW - ABC News
articles.description: The driver aged in his 60s arrived in South Australia from New South Wales last night and was tested at Yamba in the Riverland.
articles.content:
A man aged in his 60s is the latest truck driver to have tested positive for COVID-19 in South Australia, hours after he returned a negative result interstate.
